alert.note: Alert for Carter; Jefferson; Johnston; Love; Marshall; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 10:31AM CDT until June 08 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR JOHNSTON...JEFFERSON...LOVE...CARTER...NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL AND SOUTHEASTERN MURRAY COUNTIES... At 1031 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Reagan to near Lake Murray to 4 miles east of Grady, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Madill, Tishomingo, Marietta, Waurika, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wilson, Dickson, Ringling, Mannsville, Ryan, Springer, Ravia, Terral, Mill Creek, Milburn, Dougherty, Gene Autry and Leon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
